title: Alternative Portfolio
subtitle: A selection of personal projects built to explore new technologies or just out of curiosity.

projects.title: Real Estate Rental App
projects.description: Web app for searching, booking, and managing rental properties, with payment system and admin dashboard. Stack: React, Node.js, MongoDB.

projects.title: Restaurant Reservation App
projects.description: Reservation management tool with time slots, client interface and back-office. Email notifications and calendar integration.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: Displays weather forecasts by city using a third-party API, with responsive design and animations. Stack: React, Axios.

projects.title: Interactive Portfolio
projects.description: Modern portfolio built with React featuring animations, contact form, and responsive design.

projects.title: Project Management App
projects.description: Task and project tracking tool with user management, notifications, and calendar. Stack: React, Node.js, MongoDB.

projects.title: Hair Salon Booking App
projects.description: Appointment booking app for a hair salon, with client management and notifications.
